product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Rendezvous Camp Chair - Special Buy
long_description: Whether you're basking on the beach, gathering around the campfire, enjoying an outdoor concert or lounging poolside, the ALPS Mountaineering Rendezvous Chair provides a strong and comfortable seat. Chair sits low to the ground and allows you to lean back at a perfect angle to relax and stretch out your legs. Collapses and fits into the included carry bag. The ALPS Mountaineering Rendezvous Chair features a sturdy powder-coated steel frame. Special buy.
short_description: Whether you're basking on the beach, gathering around the campfire, enjoying an outdoor concert or lounging poolside, the ALPS Mountaineering Rendezvous Chair provides a strong and comfortable seat.
